name: Table Invaders
overview: You need to learn your multiplication tables if you want to stop aliens from invading the earth! All programs are carefully designed with the help of parents, teachers and children. When a program is complete it is tested by children in schools until every possible improvement has been made. Only then do we allow it to go on sale. All programs feature colourful graphics and excellent sound effects. The games are fun, children love to play them! That's why they learn from them.
